column4: Good evening, I'm reading a lot of tutorials about how to enable xgl on a Dapper installation, and they all say to aptitude install xserver-xgl, however it's not there
I recall you need to add some sources to the list
I don't seem to find them online, they all say to use Dapper main and restricted
well I am not sure, it has been a while
try the soruces here http://www.ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=148351 it is a pinned thread
